title: 1-Minute Standing Exercises - No Jumping - Weight Loss Workout
description:
Who says you can't do exercises when you're having knee problems, or lower body issues? 

Today's workout is here to show how you can still lose weight at home even if you have physical conditions that might interfere with your ability to exercise! 

In today's video workout I have included the best body-weight exercises that will help burn calories but don't require any jumping or excessive effort for your knees and legs. It's an effective low impact workout program to get in shape! 

Good luck and let's begin the workout!❤️💪

TIMECODES:

00:00 Introduction
01:04 Rest
01:21 Arm Crossovers
02:22 Rest
02:44 Knee Drive
03:48 Rest
04:15 Hip Swirls
07:18 Windmill
10:32 Step Back Jacks
13:55 Diagonal Abs Right
17:09 Lateral Steps
25:00 Leg Kicks
channelDescription:
I'm here to help you look and feel great, with effective body weight workouts and exercises.

Burn calories and extra fat with simple workout routines you can easily do at home. No equipment or gym necessary.

New video workouts Monday to Friday and then Sunday as well.
tags: home low impact weight loss workout

comments: I’ve been doing these exercises for 15 days and dieting for 1 month and half, i was 61 kg and now I’m 54.4 kg ❤ feeling so good and proud of my achievement 😎 thank you Roberta 🎉 done with today’s exercise
I am a 28 year old mother with two children and since May I do these exercises 5 times a week I weighed 78 now I weigh 64..it really works !!
Loving these exercises. Started 2 days ago with an intent to lose weight. Will update my achievement after 15 days.
How many people over here who fallen love with Roberta's gym workout?
